name: Construction CO.
description:
-Made for Blackthornprod Gamejam-

Towers cost your MULTIPLIER wich get you more points! The more towers you have the less points you get!

You are a normal worker on a company called Construction CO. But suddenly robots invade the city! OHNO! Its your job to save the world and be a hero.

Move: WASD

Repair: E

Place towers by clicking the buttons in the left corner!
